items.title: What America's top economists are saying about AI and inequality
items.description: Planet Money attended the annual meeting of American economists — and the most popular topic this year was artificial intelligence.

items.title: How to quickly find something you lost: 10 clever and practical techniques
items.description: NPR readers share their best methods for finding missing objects — from tiny screws to lost wallets. One favorite tip? Use a good flashlight.
